articles.title: Bengali actor Arun Guhathakurta succumbs to Covid-19 - Telangana Today
articles.description: Kolkata: Veteran Bengali film actor Arun Guhathakurta succumbed to Covid-19 at a south Kolkata hospital around 1.45 pm on Tuesday. Guhathakurta was a powerful character artiste who is best known for his performances in Bangla films like Cinemawala (2016), Bis…

articles.description: Param Vir Chakra awardee Vikram Batra's twin Vishal Batra narrates how the news of Vikram's martyrdom at Kargil shocked his eldest sister who was in the family way. She rushed from Mandi to be with parents.
